about_the_game:
The villain erased part of your memory and broke these memories into fragments by locking them in an energy tower . Your task is to properly connect the energy to restore your memories. This is a strategy game that develops logic and attentiveness , as well as a good time killer . In this addition, there are several more levels in a new atmosphere, in a new location with an emphasis on Hentai, and in the process of passing the game you will find a surprise that hentai lovers will appreciate. In general, this is pure hentai whatever you like :)
The rules of the game:
You will need to build bridges between energy sources and gates that hide girls avoiding places with bombs that destroy previously built bridges
In this supplement :
New cute art
New gallery with pictures
New good music
New dynamic atmosphere
New achievements
Leaders

content_descriptors.notes: THE GAME HAS SEX SCENES AND NUDE BODY PARTS

  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible
